name: helpdesk-ui
description: Tiny Panda Helpdesk UI - Modular HTML/CSS/JS for Wix Blocks

scripts.watch: node -e "const chokidar = require('chokidar'); chokidar.watch('src').on('change', () => { console.log('Rebuilding...'); require('child_process').execSync('node build.js', {stdio: 'inherit'}); });"

author: Tiny Panda
